definitions.definition: The stripping off of an outer layer of skin by snakes and certain other animals; typically in accommodation to growth or wear-and-tear; as distinct from the term " moulting ", not in reference to the shedding of hair or feathers.
The shedding of an exoskeleton , as in insects and crustaceans .

main_definition: The stripping off of an outer layer of skin by snakes and certain other animals; typically in accommodation to growth or wear-and-tear; as distinct from the term " moulting ", not in reference to the shedding of hair or feathers.
secondary_definitions: The shedding of an exoskeleton , as in insects and crustaceans .
